channel.title: Summer '22 Week 5 :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: Resources Slides Video Script Hello, and welcome to the week five announcements video for CIS 526 and CC 515, in summer 2022. So this week, you should be working on week five, which is the second of a two week series that leads up toward milestone four, where we really shift our focus from static websites and a little bit of Ajax in the browser to full on dynamic websites using Express and all sorts of things around that. So it’s a big shift, it’s a two week milestone. So make sure you give yourself plenty of time to get working on this milestone. A big hint for me is if you start milestone four on Monday, you’re probably not going to get it done and turn it in yet that day, it is quite a bigger project than the last few milestones.
